title: Raised-Bed and Container Gardening Made Simple: 6 Easy Steps For Beginners To Grow Fruit And Vegetables In Your Own Backyard On A Budget
features: Do you want to grow delicious fresh fruit and vegetables at home? Are you a little envious of people with a green thumb?
If you’re not sure where to start, or you think it’s not possible in the small space you have, keep reading!
Creating a beautiful garden that produces mouthwatering delights sounds daunting and expensive, but it doesn’t have to be!
Raised-Bed and Container Gardening Made Simple: 6 Easy Steps for Beginners to Grow Fruits and Vegetables in Your Own Backyard on a Budget
takes away the mystery of building and maintaining a vegetable garden, giving you access to your own personal produce aisle at minimal cost, right at your fingertips!
Inside
Raised-Bed and Container Gardening Made Simple: 6 Easy Steps for Beginners to Grow Fruits and Vegetables in Your Own Backyard on a Budget
, A.A. Doyle shares tips, tricks, and personal experiences that will help you:
decide between self-built or store-bought raised beds or containers and give you ideas on how to upcycle containers you might already have.
decide between self-built or store-bought raised beds or containers and give you ideas on how to upcycle containers you might already have.
unearth the different types of soil your garden will need and make your own compost to nourish your growing seedlings.
unearth the different types of soil your garden will need and make your own compost to nourish your growing seedlings.
dive into the world of water and take the guesswork out of irrigation.
dive into the world of water and take the guesswork out of irrigation.
get your hands dirty and start planting your seeds and seedlings both indoors and outside.
get your hands dirty and start planting your seeds and seedlings both indoors and outside.
bring out your inner horticulturist with 25 easy-to-follow plant care guides.
bring out your inner horticulturist with 25 easy-to-follow plant care guides.

You can grow your own delectable fruit and vegetables whether you live in the city, the suburbs, or in the country! You’re renting an apartment or house? That’s no problem! A raised bed or container garden is portable—simply dismantle it and take it with you when you move!
Why wait?
Scroll up, click “Buy Now With 1-Click” button, and you’ll start harvesting from your own garden before you know it!
description: Reviewed in the United States �������� on December 29, 2022

I enjoyed the author's conversational style, it made me smile while reading. I also appreciated that the author's approach makes gardening more accessible - breaking it down into most important factors (i.e. water, soil, seeds), and followed with more detail for reader to make further choices for their own situation.

Reviewed in the United States �������� on February 8, 2023This book sooo easy to follow. It's written step-by-step, so any prospective gardener can begin it and have a lush bed-garden when they reach the end. The writing is so engaging yet calming--like an old familiar friend sharing her secrets with me. It's a short book, but it gets to the point in the comfiest and most accessible way. I'm interested in reading more from this author, especially if it's more gardening-related stuff. Before that, I can't wait for my mint to start growing!Excellent starting point for people looking to get started with gardening in containers and raised beds!
